description: Beautiful brand new modern 1/2 duplex!!! This Gorgeous 6 bed and 4 bath with an open concept floor plan features family area with gas fireplace, dine-in and kitchen with modern touch along with an island and plenty of cabinets. The Master Bedroom with an ensuite that includes walk-in closet. Double car garage and lots of parking on driveway and front lane. No restrictions or bylaws. Close to all amenities. 2 BEDROOM MORTGAGE HELPER!!!
